question: who sponsored the phoenix open before waste management
api_result: Before Waste Management became the title sponsor, the Phoenix Open was sponsored by the FBR (Friedman Billings Ramsey), a Virginia-based investment bank. The tournament was known as the FBR Open from 2004 to 2009. Prior to FBR, the event had other sponsors and names, including the Phoenix Open and the Motorola Western Open. Waste Management took over as the title sponsor starting in 2010.
